data.overview: Scammers often promise you big profits very quickly from your money. They might talk about new ways to invest, like with digital money, or a special scheme. They want you to put your hard-earned money into their fake plans.
important_tips: Never share your one-time password (OTP) with anyone.
Keep your important documents and personal details safe.
Always double-check payment links before you click or pay.
how_it_works: A scammer will contact you and promise you can earn a lot of money very fast.
They will ask you to put a small amount of money into their fake plan first.
After you invest, they often disappear with all your money.
red_flags: Someone promises you very high returns on your money in a very short time.
They pressure you to invest right away without giving you time to think.
The investment plan seems too good to be true.
prevention_steps: Always check who you are dealing with before investing any money.
Talk to a trusted family member or friend before making big money decisions.
If someone you don't know offers you amazing returns, be very careful.
real_world_examples: Someone might promise to double your money in digital currency in just 30 days.
A fraudster could ask you to join a 'money chain' where you get paid by recruiting new people.
You might see online ads promising quick riches by investing in a fake company.
what_to_do_if_you_are_a_victim: Do not feel bad or blame yourself; these scammers are very tricky.
Tell a trusted family member or friend about what happened right away.
Collect all the information you have about the scam, like messages or bank details.
safe_checklist: Does this offer sound too good to be true?
Have I checked if the company or person is real and trustworthy?
Have I talked to someone I trust about this offer?
legal_help_and_reporting: You can report financial scams to the National Cybercrime Helpline by dialing 1930.
You can also visit the cybercrime reporting portal online at www.cybercrime.gov.in.
Tell your bank immediately if you have sent money to a scammer.
